article_title: SNL brilliantly mocks Marvel’s sexism with trailer for “Black Widow: Age of Me”
article_text:
Topics: black widow, Marvel, Saturday Night Live, Scarlett Johansson, Sexism, superheroes, Video, women, Media News, Life News, Entertainment News, News

This week’s “Saturday Night Live” called out Marvel’s refusal to give one of its female superheroes a movie of her own. Host Scarlett Johansson starred in a trailer for Black Widow’s first movie all to herself — a RomCom about the heroine scoring a job at a fashion magazine in New York and striking up a fraught relationship with Ultron, a robot with a strobe light for a penis.

“You wanna know, why no Black Widow movie?” a narrator growls over the trailer. “Does Marvel not know how to make a girl superhero movie? Chill! Marvel gets women.
